com.sun.xml.ws.commons.virtualbox
Class IHostNetworkInterface

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.xml.ws.commons.virtualbox.VBoxObject
      com.sun.xml.ws.commons.virtualbox.IHostNetworkInterface

public class IHostNetworkInterface
extends VBoxObject

Reprents one of host's network interfaces. IP V6 address and network mask are strings of 32 hexdecimal digits grouped by four. Groups are separated by colons. For example, fe80:0000:0000:0000:021e:c2ff:fed2:b030.
